## Makecondition

```{r makecondition}
library(reticulate)
use_condaenv("r-reticulate")

library(econR) # 經濟模型程式設計專題用
```

## Install packages

Through Conda:
```{r, eval=F}
conda_install("r-reticulate",
              packages=c("numpy", "pandas"))
```

Through PyPI:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
conda_install("r-reticulate",
              packages=c("numpy", "pandas"),
              pip = TRUE)
```
